Default isoorbi plotting theme

Source: R/plotting.R
orbi_default_theme.Rd

Default isoorbi plotting theme

Usage

orbi_default_theme(text_size = 16, facet_text_size = 20)

Arguments

text_size

a font size for text

facet_text_size

a font size for facet text

Value

ggplot theme object
